of which are increasingly important given Google's global reach. Internally, he will continue to act as an advisor to Larry Page and Sergey Brin . Commenting on these changes, Eric Schmidt said in the press release: We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. Larry Page said in the press release:`` Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade. The results speak for themselves.
